name: StationAroundQuery
description: Filter which can be applied to retrieve the station around list action

inputFields.name: location
inputFields.description: The GeoJSON Point of the center of the around me circle

inputFields.name: distance
inputFields.description: Distance, in meters, to search around

inputFields.name: amenities
inputFields.description: Amentities available near a station. Values: restaurant, bathroom, supermarket, playground, coffee, shopping, museum, hotel, park
